name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in automation and performance testing across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in UI Testing and API Testing using **Selenium** and **JUnit**, alongside strong skills in **JavaScript**, **Golang**, **Java**, **C#**, **CSS**, **HTML**, **DOM**, and **Git** to ensure high-quality software delivery. Experienced in Agile methodologies and Test-Driven Development (TDD) to enhance coding efficiency and maintainability.

Specialized in automating testing processes and developing comprehensive testing frameworks, leveraging strong communication and accountability skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Additionally, I bring a wealth of knowledge in developing high-performance applications with **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, emphasizing seamless integration and compliance-driven development, including HIPAA and PCI DSS standards. My background in creating AI/ML-powered platforms adds a unique perspective to testing methodologies, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Implemented **Automation** frameworks for comprehensive testing across applications using **Selenium**, **JUnit**, and **Golang**, ensuring high-quality releases through continuous integration.
• Developed rigorous **UI Testing** strategies to validate user interactions and interface elements, utilizing **JavaScript**, **CSS**, and **HTML** to maintain robust frontend performance.
• Executed **API Testing** to verify backend functionalities and service integrations, employing **Postman** and custom scripts built in **Java** and **C#** to ensure reliability.
• Led initiatives to integrate **Test-Driven Development** practices across teams, fostering a culture of **Agile** methodologies and accountability in the testing process.
• Maintained version control and source code management using **Git**, ensuring all team members adhere to best practices for efficient collaboration.
• Collaboratively defined and enforced testing strategies encompassing unit, integration, and end-to-end tests, optimizing coverage and defect detection rates by **30%**.
• Championed test automation initiatives that reduced manual testing time by **40%**, enhancing the pace of product release cycles.
• Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship on **JavaScript** frameworks, fostering knowledge sharing and improving overall code quality across the product.
• Communicated testing outcomes and system performance metrics to stakeholders, ensuring clear understanding and accountability for software quality.

Conducted rigorous **Automation** testing strategies utilizing **JUnit**, **Selenium**, and **API Testing** frameworks to ensure software quality and reliability across all projects.
Collaborated with development teams using **Agile** methodologies to implement **Test-Driven Development** practices, fostering a culture of accountability and open communication.
Designed comprehensive UI Test cases for web applications developed with **Java**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, enhancing user experience and interface reliability.
Utilized **Git** for version control management, facilitating coordinated teamwork and code management processes.
Engaged in cross-platform testing strategies, validating web applications across various browsers and devices, achieving an average test coverage of **90%**.
Performed detailed **API Testing** on services developed in **Golang** and **C#**, ensuring adherence to specifications and performance benchmarks with response times under **200ms**.
Implemented continuous integration and delivery pipelines, reducing deployment times by **30%** and improving workflow efficiency.
Lead performance testing of applications, identifying bottlenecks and ensuring throughput meets enterprise standards, achieving a load tolerance of concurrent user sessions reaching **10,000+**.

- Automated complex testing processes for web applications, employing **JUnit** and **Selenium** to ensure robust UI and API testing covering over **90%** of critical paths.
- Conducted comprehensive API testing with **Postman** and **Swagger**, enhancing automated test coverage and improving release cycle efficiency by **30%**.
- Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Git** and **Jenkins**, facilitating seamless integration and deployment practices aligned with Agile methodologies.
- Collaborated cross-functionally in an Agile environment, communicating test insights and findings effectively, demonstrating strong accountability in project management and delivery timelines.
- Implemented Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices across teams, fostering a culture of quality and accountability to ensure sustainable software development.
- Engaged in regular code reviews and pair programming sessions, influencing coding standards and best practices among engineering teams.
- Utilized **Golang** and **JavaScript** to create automated scripts, reducing manual testing efforts by **40%** and improving time efficiency in release cycles.
- Provided thorough documentation and training on testing processes, improving knowledge sharing and enhancing team productivity.
- Acted as a mentor to junior QA engineers, fostering a collaborative environment focused on improved testing strategies and methodologies.
